abstract: Changers, a German-based start-up, will soon begin offering an ultra-simple solar charging device that can also track the amount of money and CO2 people save.
snippet: Changers, a German-based start-up, will soon begin offering an ultra-simple solar charging device that can also track the amount of money and CO2 people save.
lead_paragraph: Companies have offered dozens of products that are supposed to let you charge a mobile device through solar power. But most have failed dismally. Some take too long to charge even a single battery, while others come with tedious connectors and wires.

headline.main: Charging Your Devices Through Solar Power
